possible_choices: In contrast to PFA, DKT models the student skill as a continuous latent variable.
In contrast to PFA and BKT, it estimates the student's success probability on the next task.
In contrast to BKT, it is guarenteed to converge to a global optimum of the loss function.
In contrast to PFA and BKT, it uses a recurrent neural network internally.
choice_explanations: No, DKT does not do that.
Not quite. PFA and BKT do that, as well.
No, the loss of DKT is generally not convex and, therefore, no global optimum can be guaranteed.
